data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Wardak, Afghanistan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wardak, Afghanistan

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 660,174, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Wardak, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 105 believers in Wardak to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Brahui people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, help your children in Wardak, Afghanistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 105 believers in Wardak to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 660,195 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the state of Wardak, Afghanistan has a population of 660,300.

We estimate Wardak has 105 people who might know Jesus, 21 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 660,174 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,288 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 660,300 people living in the state of Wardak.
